meanings: 스포츠 경기 관람 It's hard to say.
스포츠 경기 관람 So hard to say when they're neck and neck.
병원에서 It hurts when I breathe.

phrases.phrase: 사무실 근처에 주차할 데 찾기가 갈수록 어려워요.
meanings: 직장에서의 표현 It's getting harder and harder to find parking close to the office.

vlive.korean: 어려워!!! It's so hard! 듣기 View video 모해 MOHAE : [미앤미] 업텐션 '샤오'편!
근데 맞추기 진짜 어려워 - 제가... - 형, 형 꺼 정답 뭐였어? But it's really hard to get it right. - I... - Hyung, what was your answer? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 🍫🍫🍫🍫🍫
vlive.english: But it's really hard to get it right. - I... - Hyung, what was your answer?

vlive.korean: 일본어 어려워요? Japanese is hard? 듣기 View video NCT : 답장 못해준 모든 시즈니 안녕 ^^
[해석: 어려워...] 으어어... [Interpretation: Difficult] Ah... 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.4
이게 어려워봤자 얼마나 어렵겠어 그냥 뭐... And thought it wouldn't be that hard. 듣기 View video NCT : 🎂🎂🎂
vlive.english: And thought it wouldn't be that hard.

examples.korean: I think he’s happy. It’s hard to tell. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 행복한 것 같기는 해. 정확히 알기는 어려워. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I think he’s happy. It’s hard to tell. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘When will the job be finished?’ ‘It’s hard to say.’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “그 일이 언제 끝날까요?” “언제라고 말하기 어려워요.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘When will the job be finished?’ ‘It’s hard to say.’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It seemed incredible that she had been there a week already. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 거기 있은 지가 이미 일주일이 되었다는 것이 믿기 어려워 보였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It seemed incredible that she had been there a week already. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Well, you know, it’s difficult to explain. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 음, 있잖아, 설명하기가 좀 어려워. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Well, you know, it’s difficult to explain. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Haven’t worked out in so long that it’s hard to get back into it again. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 정말 오랫동안 운동을 안 했더니 예전 상태로 다시 돌아가기가 어려워. DARAKWON
examples.english: Haven’t worked out in so long that it’s hard to get back into it again. Add to Wordbook
